A pet peeve is mine is when people say "she's only 3". 

Miss, if I want to over indulge for my child I shall. And if I want to teach and challenge her on something "outside her age bracket", I shall.

author: Life’s Good ⚡️♐️♈️
text: Counseling is not “one and done”. You may finish your counseling sessions and find out, months or years later, that the issue(s)/trigger(s) are not resolved. It’s more than okay to go back. Different phases of life may bring up different emotions.
